languages.text: {n}Раздраженно отмахнувшись мехадендритом, Паскаль нетерпеливо произносит:{/n} "Благословенный Амарнат может повелевать любому механизму на своем корабле. Индоктринальная ересь, изрекаемая данной единицей, не стоит внимания".

{n}Pasqal waves a mechadendrite at him in annoyed dismissal and says impatiently,{/n} "The blessed Amarnat can command any mechanism on his ship. The indoctrinal heresy uttered by the unit is unworthy of attention."
languages.original_text: {n}Раздраженно отмахнувшись мехадендритом, Паскаль нетерпеливо произносит:{/n} "Благословенный Амарнат может повелевать любому механизму на своем корабле. Индоктринальная ересь, изрекаемая данной единицей, не стоит внимания".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal waves a mechadendrite at him in annoyed dismissal and says impatiently,{/n} "The blessed Amarnat can command any mechanism on his ship. The indoctrinal heresy uttered by the unit is unworthy of attention."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは機械触手を自分に向けてうねらせ、苛立ちのままに却下すると耐えきれず口を開く。{/n}「恩寵受けしアマルナトは、己の船のあらゆる機械に命令をくだせます。このユニットから発せられた教義上の異端は目をくれる価値も無い」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal waves a mechadendrite at him in annoyed dismissal and says impatiently,{/n} "The blessed Amarnat can command any mechanism on his ship. The indoctrinal heresy uttered by the unit is unworthy of attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは機械触手を自分に向けてうねらせ、苛立ちのままに却下すると耐えきれず口を開く。{/n}「恩寵受けしアマルナトは、己の船のあらゆる機械に命令をくだせます。このユニットから発せられた教義上の異端は目をくれる価値も無い」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡恼怒地向他挥了挥机械触须，不耐烦地开了口。{/n}“神圣的阿玛纳特可以指挥船上的任何机械装置，这个单位所说的异端教义不值一听。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal waves a mechadendrite at him in annoyed dismissal and says impatiently,{/n} "The blessed Amarnat can command any mechanism on his ship. The indoctrinal heresy uttered by the unit is unworthy of attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡尔恼怒地向他挥了挥机械触须，不耐烦地开了口。{/n}“神圣的阿玛纳特可以指挥船上的任何机械装置，这个单位所说的异端教义不值一听。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Contrarié, Pasqal balaie ces paroles d'un geste d'une mécadendrite avant d'ajouter sur un ton impatient :{/n} « Amarnat le béni peut commander aux mécanismes de ce vaisseau. L'hérésie prononcée par cette unité n'est pas digne d'attention. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal waves a mechadendrite at him in annoyed dismissal and says impatiently,{/n} "The blessed Amarnat can command any mechanism on his ship. The indoctrinal heresy uttered by the unit is unworthy of attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Contrarié, Pasqal balaie ces paroles d'un geste d'une mécadendrite avant d'ajouter sur un ton impatient :{/n} « Amarnat le béni peut commander aux mécanismes de ce vaisseau. L'hérésie prononcée par cette unité n'est pas digne d'attention. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal agita una mecadendrita hacia él en un gesto de desprecio y dice impacientemente:{/n} «El bendito Amarnat puede dar órdenes a cualquier mecanismo de esta nave. No debemos hacer caso a la herejía doctrinal pronunciada por esta unidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal waves a mechadendrite at him in annoyed dismissal and says impatiently,{/n} "The blessed Amarnat can command any mechanism on his ship. The indoctrinal heresy uttered by the unit is unworthy of attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal agita una mecadendrita hacia él en un gesto de desprecio y dice impacientemente:{/n} «El bendito Amarnat puede dar órdenes a cualquier mecanismo de esta nave. No debemos hacer caso a la herejía doctrinal pronunciada por esta unidad».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal winkt gereizt mit einem Mechadendriten ab und sagt ungeduldig:{/n} "Der gesegnete Amarnat kann jeden Mechanismus auf seinem Schiff befehligen. Die indoktrinbasierte Ketzerei der Einheit ist keiner Aufmerksamkeit würdig."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal waves a mechadendrite at him in annoyed dismissal and says impatiently,{/n} "The blessed Amarnat can command any mechanism on his ship. The indoctrinal heresy uttered by the unit is unworthy of attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal winkt gereizt mit einem Mechadendriten ab und sagt ungeduldig:{/n} "Der gesegnete Amarnat kann jeden Mechanismus auf seinem Schiff befehligen. Die indoktrinbasierte Ketzerei der Einheit ist keiner Aufmerksamkeit würdig."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, siniri bozulmuş bir şekilde mekadentritlerinden birini adama sallayıp sabırsızca konuşuyor.{/n} "Kutsanmış Amarnat, bu gemideki bütün mekanizmalara komut verebilir. Birim tarafından sarf edilen doktrin dışı kâfirli, dikkate değmez seviyede."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal waves a mechadendrite at him in annoyed dismissal and says impatiently,{/n} "The blessed Amarnat can command any mechanism on his ship. The indoctrinal heresy uttered by the unit is unworthy of attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal adama siniri bozulmuş bir şekilde mekadentritlerinden birini sallıyor ve sabırsızca konuşuyor:{/n} "Kutsanmış Amarnat bu gemideki bütün mekanizmalara komut verebilir. Birim tarafından sarf edilen doktrin dışı kâfirlik dikkate değmez."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
